{{#vardefine:modalCount|{{#expr:{{#var:modalCount|0}}+1}}}}
<span type="button" class="btn btn-primary btn-lg" data-bs-toggle="modal" data-bs-target="#SimpleModal{{#var:modalCount}}">{{{btnLabel}}}</span>
<div class="modal fade" id="SimpleModal{{#var:modalCount}}" tabindex="-1" role="dialog" aria-labelledby="myModalLabel">
<div class="modal-dialog">
<div class="modal-content">
<div class="modal-header">
<span role="button" class="btn-close" data-bs-dismiss="modal" aria-label="Close"></span>
<h4 class="modal-title" id="myModalLabel">{{{title}}}</h4></div>
<div class="modal-body">{{{body}}}</div><div class="modal-footer">{{{footer|}}}</div></div></div></div>
